pages.text: $(major)Organic Substrate/$ is the first of the mod's potions.$(br2)Organic Substrate has no effect when drunk, but is used in some recipes.$(br2)If a $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/cell)Cell/$ is brewed into Organic Substrate, the Substrate is replaced with a copy of the Cell. Given that you can have 3 Potions in a single brew, this allows you to triple Cells, if needed.

Additionally, Organic Substrate is used to brew $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/cell_growth)Potions of Cell Growth/$.$(br2)You may prefer to use the $(l:geneticsresequenced:blocks/incubator)Incubator/$ to brew these recipes, rather than the Brewing Stand.
